thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com | 3 of 116
thread.title: Sarina M

author: Sarina M
title: Sarina M
text: As someone who doesn't have a lot of time to do food orders, I appreciate how easy it is to find companies and how you can filter it down by many variables. I've used CaterCow and while I think CaterCow does a better job of showing pictures and presenting what their platters look like, they don't have the ability to customize and filter down to what you really need (especially in terms of delivery charges and other various fees) that I think it's important.
